results.title: [Treatment of post-transplant erythrocytosis: comparison of lisinopril and theophylline].

results.title: Treatment of postrenal transplant erythrocytosis. Long-term efficacy and safety of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors.
results.text_hl: Fifty-two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with postrenal transplant @<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011086 @@@erythrocytosis@@@ were treated with an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@) for a median of 13 months (range 0-44).

citations.NLM: MacGregor MS, Rowe PA, Watson MA, Rodger RS, Junor BJ, Briggs JD. Treatment of postrenal transplant erythrocytosis. Long-term efficacy and safety of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors. Nephron. 1996;74(3):517-21. PMID: 8938674
citations.BibTeX: @article{8938674, title={Treatment of postrenal transplant erythrocytosis. Long-term efficacy and safety of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors.}, author={MacGregor MS and Rowe PA and Watson MA and Rodger RS and Junor BJ and Briggs JD}, journal={Nephron}, volume={74}, number={3}, pages={517-21}}

results.title: [Treatment of post kidney transplantation erythrocytosis (PTE) with ACE inhibitors].
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@-inhibitors (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) or alternatively the use of angiotensin II receptor antagonists, like @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@Losartan@@@, at low doses, is an effective and safe treatment for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ developing @<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011086 @@@post-transplantation erythrocytosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011086 @@@PTE@@@).

citations.NLM: Morale W, Puliatti C, Veroux P, Veroux M, Valvo C, Cappello D, Puliatti D, Francesco L. [Treatment of post kidney transplantation erythrocytosis (PTE) with ACE inhibitors]. Minerva Urol Nefrol. 2002 Jun;54(2):145-8. PMID: 12070465
citations.BibTeX: @article{12070465, title={[Treatment of post kidney transplantation erythrocytosis (PTE) with ACE inhibitors].}, author={Morale W and Puliatti C and Veroux P and Veroux M and Valvo C and Cappello D and Puliatti D and Francesco L}, journal={Minerva Urol Nefrol}, volume={54}, number={2}, pages={145-8}}

results.title: [Treatment of post kidney transplantation erythrocytosis (PTE) with ACE inhibitors].
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@-inhibitors (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) or alternatively the use of angiotensin II receptor antagonists, like Iosartan at low doses, is an effective and safe treatment for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ developing @<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011086 @@@post-transplantation erythrocytosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011086 @@@PTE@@@).

citations.NLM: Morale W, Puliatti C, Veroux P, Veroux M, Valvo C, Cappello D, Puliatti D, Francesco L. [Treatment of post kidney transplantation erythrocytosis (PTE) with ACE inhibitors]. Minerva Urol Nefrol. 2002 Sep;54(3):189-92. PMID: 12384621
